overview: "They're wild and they're spooky, they're anal and they're kooky..."  It's the parody sendup of the year! All the weirdo's - all in one place! And best of all, Ron Jeremy's just a hand! You never see his body!  William Black, the genius behind AnalNation and Total Reball take a twisted look at television's most twisted family in the video that asks the question: How can any family be this dysfunctional?
tagline: Mortushie. Letch. Pudley. Anal is their Thing.
title: The Anus Family
